trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_000<tab>Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, it is an honor. Would that my brothers- and sisters-in-arms had survived to see Bozja free of the IVth Legion.
TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_001<tab>Ah, my apologies─we have not been formally introduced. I am Meryall, the...the last of Gunnhildr's Blades.

TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_002<tab>And so long as I live, I swear on my honor as a Blade of the queen, history will not forget the sacrifices made to grant Bozja her freedom. The names of my fallen comrades will live on!

TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_003<tab>That the imperials would dare sully their honor by turning them against us, turning them into monsters... It is more than my heart can bear.
TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_004<tab>For a blessing, one of my fellow Blades yet remained whole of body and we were able to take him into custody.
TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_005<tab>If I understand currently, a cure for tempering has been discovered, yes? Then it is only a matter of time before his mind is restored.
TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_006<tab>Then we can begin to rebuild Gunnhildr's Blades in earnest. It is the least we can do to honor our fallen.

TEXT_REGOTH4MYCSURVIVOR_00720_BLADESOFGUNNHILDR_000_007<tab>If not for you, I very much doubt I would even be here to carry on the traditions of Gunnhildr's Blades. On behalf of the Blades who came before, and those who will come after, I thank you.
